tool_description:
UPDATED Aug 2023
Unlimited Criminal Checks API 2.0 offers a low cost solution for people lookups including public data, reverse phone, reverse email, nationwide offender lookups and more.
name: Complete Criminal Checks Offender Data
title: Complete Criminal Checks Offender Data

api_list.name: API Docs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://complete-criminal-checks-offender-data.p.rapidapi.com/completecriminalchecks.com/api/v2/xml/?DataBase=7&state=ALL&firstname=George&lastname=Zimmerman&exact=0&aka=0&limit=100"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "complete-criminal-checks-offender-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://complete-criminal-checks-offender-data.p.rapidapi.com/completecriminalchecks.com/api/v2/xml/?DataBase=7&state=ALL&firstname=George&lastname=Zimmerman&exact=0&aka=0&limit=100"
